document.full_text: a significant portion of people - perhaps as many as one in five - don't take drugs a doctor has prescribed because they can't pay for them, according to a new survey of people visiting an emergency room.
document.title: many don't take prescriptions because of cost
lines_and_colors: a significant portion of people - perhaps as many as one in five - don't take drugs a doctor has prescribed because they can't pay for them, according to a new survey of people visiting an emergency room.
